recipe_name: Baby scallops with a breadcrumb crust
author: Max Beesley
method: Preheat the grill to medium. Place the baby scallops on a baking tray. In a food processor, mix together the breadcrumbs, garlic, parsley and lemon zest. Season the mix with salt and freshly ground black pepper, and sprinkle it over the scallops. Drizzle a little oil over the scallops and cook under the grill for a couple of minutes until crisp on top and scallops are cooked through.
ingredients: 12 baby scallops, in their shells,  55g/2oz breadcrumbs,  1 garlic clove, peeled and crushed,  handful flatleaf parsley, chopped,  zest of 1 lemon,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  dash olive oil
